description: prints a list of all commands and descriptions of their usage
specifies the reel ID number using <realNumber>
notifies the program that you have advanced the reel once
notifies the program that you are viewing the image at <imageNumber>
shows you the current description of the location that you are viewing
shows you all of the events associated with the location that you are viewing in chronological order
prints a list of all event names
prints the event that matches [name] if it was provided or a random event if it was not
prints a list of all item names
prints a description of the item
prints all of the notes associated with the <item>
add or overwrite the location's description
adds an event to the location
adds an item to the location
adds a new note to the <item>
